content.query:
CREATE DATABASE dai_serverless_db;

USE dai_serverless_db;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE PublishDeltaLakeStorage
WITH ( location = 'abfss://kannainput@jithendra231221.dfs.core.windows.net/' );
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT PublishDeltaLakeFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA );
GO

drop EXTERNAL TABLE generic.training_set_tf;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE generic.training_set_tf 
(
	ID VARCHAR(255),
	mmsi VARCHAR(255),
	curr_running_timestamp VARCHAR(255),
	prev_running_timestamp VARCHAR(255),
	running_diff_minutes FLOAT(53),
	final_arrival_timestamp VARCHAR(255),
	final_arrival_diff_minutes FLOAT(53),
	curr_longitude VARCHAR(255),
	curr_latitude VARCHAR(255),
	end_latitude VARCHAR(255),
	end_longitude VARCHAR(255),
	SPEED VARCHAR(255),
	COURSE VARCHAR(255),
	HEADING VARCHAR(255),
	TURNRATE VARCHAR(255),
	BREADTH VARCHAR(255),
	VESSEL_TYPE VARCHAR(255),
	VESSEL_MAX_SPEED VARCHAR(255),
	DRAFT VARCHAR(255),
	POWER VARCHAR(255),
	DWT VARCHAR(255),
	dq_check INT
)
WITH
(
LOCATION = 'cleanse/training_set_json/marine_poc/validate_set_json/processed_date=20220115/',
DATA_SOURCE = PublishDeltaLakeStorage,
FILE_FORMAT = PublishDeltaLakeFormat
);
abfss://kannainput@jithendra231221.dfs.core.windows.net/cleanse/marine_poc/validate_set_json/processed_date=20220115

select * from generic.training_set_tf;
